name: Sparkling Sumac Lemonade
description: A modern take on "sumac-ade" is a fun, refreshing thirst quencher.
recipeYield: makes enough syrup for 8 to 9 drinks.
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon juice from 1 lemon, plus 1 lemon, cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: For the Sumac Syrup: Combine water and sugar in a small saucepan. Heat over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the sugar is dissolved. All to cool to room temperature. Add sumac, stir to combine, and allow to infuse for 5 minutes. Strain through a fine mesh strainer. Sumac syrup can be stored in a sealed container in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.
For the Soda: For each serving, combine 1 cup club soda, 1/4 cup sumac syrup, and 1 tablespoon lemon juice in a cup. Add ice and stir. Serve immediately with lemon wedges.
